Question: Now, this person could win favor with the Catholics within France while also controlling Rome in a political sense.
Hints: This person was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
Wellington, when asked who was the greatest general of the day, answered: "In this age, in past ages, in any age, this person.".
With a small cadre of followers, this person dictated his memoirs and criticised his captors—particularly Lowe.
